detaileddescription.para: Saves the last state and the last substate

memberdef.name: bal_state
memberdef.initializer: = { .timer = 0, .statereq = BAL_STATE_NO_REQUEST, .state = BAL_STATEMACH_UNINITIALIZED, .substate = BAL_ENTRY, .laststate = BAL_STATEMACH_UNINITIALIZED, .lastsubstate = 0, .triggerentry = 0, .ErrRequestCounter = 0, .active = FALSE, .resting = TRUE, .rest_timer = BAL_TIME_BEFORE_BALANCING_S*100, .balancing_threshold = BAL_THRESHOLD_MV + BAL_HYSTERESIS_MV, }

detaileddescription.para: contains the state of the contactor state machine

briefdescription.para: checks the state requests that are made.

detaileddescription.para: This function checks the validity of the state requests. The resuls of the checked is returned immediately.

simplesect.para: result of the state request that was made, taken from BAL_RETURN_TYPE_e

detaileddescription.para: This function is used in the functioning of the BAL state machine.

simplesect.para: retval current state request, taken from BAL_STATE_REQUEST_e

briefdescription.para: transfers the current state request to the state machine.

detaileddescription.para: This function takes the current state request from bal_state and transfers it to the state machine. It resets the value from bal_state to BAL_STATE_NO_REQUEST

simplesect.para: retVal current state request, taken from BAL_STATE_REQUEST_e

briefdescription.para: re-entrance check of BAL state machine trigger function

detaileddescription.para: This function is not re-entrant and should only be called time- or event-triggered. It increments the triggerentry counter from the state variable bal_state. It should never be called by two different processes, so if it is the case, triggerentry should never be higher than 0 when this function is called.

simplesect.para: retval 0 if no further instance of the function is active, 0xff else

detaileddescription.para: This function is used in the functioning of the BAL state machine.

briefdescription.para: sets the current state request of the state variable bal_state.

detaileddescription.para: This function is used to make a state request to the state machine,e.g, start voltage measurement, read result of voltage measurement, re-initialization It calls BAL_CheckStateRequest() to check if the request is valid. The state request is rejected if is not valid. The result of the check is returned immediately, so that the requester can act in case it made a non-valid state request.

simplesect.para: retVal current state request, taken from BAL_STATE_REQUEST_e

briefdescription.para: trigger function for the BAL driver state machine.

detaileddescription.para: This function contains the sequence of events in the BAL state machine. It must be called time-triggered, every 1ms.
